title: Ticket #3745: Lark netwrok policy callout should also work with file transfer
description:
In Lark, file transfer now also happens in job-private network namespace instead of system network namespace. Previously, the network policy callout mechanism is only implemented for setting up the network for job execution.

Now we also need to make sure that before the file transfer starts, the machine ClassAd has been updated with network related ClassAd attributes from the output of network policy callout script. This updated machine ClassAd is actually used to setup network for stage in, executing job and stage out.
